name: Unravel
notes:
* Requires gst-plugins-good to run.
* Installs vcrun2012 with winetricks
* Disables Origin in-game overlay (required or game won't launch)
* Enables DXVK

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Log in to Origin, install Unravel, and then exit Origin. Do not launch the game!

installer.execute:
echo '<?xml version="1.0"?>
<Settings>
  <Setting type="10" key="DefaultTab" value="mygames"/>
  <Setting type="1" value="false" key="EnableIgo"/>
</Settings>
' | tee "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Origin/local_"*".xml"

content:
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  args: /StartClientMinimized origin://launchgame/Origin.OFR.50.0000823
  prefix: $GAMEDIR

wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-protonified-3.21-x86_64
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  ondemand_command: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/updateorigin.sh

files:
- client: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
- updater: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrDoctor13/wine-origin-updater/master/updateorigin.sh

installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    description: Installing vcrun2012 with winetricks
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

- task:
    name: wineexec
    arch: win64
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
    args: origin2://library/open
    description: Log in to Origin, install Unravel, and then exit Origin. Do not launch the game!
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

# Disables Origin in-game overlay
- execute: |
    echo '<?xml version="1.0"?>
    <Settings>
      <Setting type="10" key="DefaultTab" value="mygames"/>
      <Setting type="1" value="false" key="EnableIgo"/>
    </Settings>
    ' | tee "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Origin/local_"*".xml"
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
